text: Margaret Joan Beazley, (born 23 July 1951) is an Australian jurist. She is the 39th and current Governor of New South Wales since 2 May 2019. She was the president of the New South Wales Court of Appeal, the first woman to hold the office, from 2013 until February 2019. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of New South Wales Category:Australian judges Category:Politicians from Sydney
title: Margaret Beazley
